name: The Wicked Manager
description:
The Wicked Manager

-----------------------------

Character Artist - My sister

Every other thing - Myself (Krit)

-----------------------------

Project for Spooktober Jam 2021

----------------------------

In the time when football isn't all about football that is why it is the time for the wicked manager come in. You are given the role of Wendi Granok who is a witch manager. You have to use your magic to fight against the rival manager to ensure your team receive a bizarre victory. In addition,  you can sacrifice your player for advantage that you truly deserved. But be warned since your rival can sacrifice the player as well. Try to win the game before full time or die trying and unlock multiple endings along the way.

----------------------------

Control

- Use mouse to progress or select choice for rock paper scissor or the sacrifice button to sacrifice your player for the game

- You can use arrows key and spacebar as well

---------------------------

Notes

This is hopefully the first game jam I have successfully published the game. I have a blast of a week despite working full-time job while doing this game jam. Luckily, my sister who also seems interested in the jam manage to help with the character artist for the game. Although, it is not much but it is an honest work. Thank you for everyone who play this game and the game jam for making it happen. Hope everyone has fun.

-----------------------------

Audio in the game

- Alchemists Tower by Kevin MacLeod

- Night of Chaos by Kevin MacLeod

- Overcast by Kevin MacLeod

- Ball kicking sound - Kicking Football Sound Effect by BerlinAtmospheres

- Pre Sacrifice Sound and Sacrifice Sound available at  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ViXSzU8UjbI

- Laughing sound by Mundial Ronaldinho Soccer 64

- Goal Scoring sound by Sound Effect Database
